meanings.definition: A type of fish found in North America.
meanings.sent1: I caught a bullpout while fishing at the lake.
meanings.sent2: The bullpout swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent3: The bullpout challenged the other fish to a race.
meanings.sent4: The bullpout's scales shimmered like tiny jewels under the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The bullpout's distinctive markings made it easy to identify.

meanings.definition: To pout or sulk in a stubborn or resentful manner.
meanings.sent1: She would bullpout whenever things didn't go her way.
meanings.sent2: He tends to bullpout when he doesn't get what he wants.
meanings.sent3: The child decided to bullpout after being told it was bedtime.
meanings.sent4: Her lower lip would bullpout whenever she was upset.
meanings.sent5: He bullpouted for hours after losing the game.
